newsitem.title: USA: Netscape falls on downgrade -- analysts.
newsitem.headline: Netscape falls on downgrade -- analysts.

text.p: Netscape Communications Corp's stock price fell sharply early Wednesday in a selloff sparked by a downgrade by Deutsche Morgan Grenfell, analysts said.
Analyst William Gurley cut his recommendation on Netscape to accumulate from buy. Gurley's office declined comment, but traders said the change was based on valuation, among other thing.

In morning Nasdaq trade, Netscape was off 8-1/4 to 50-1/2, a decline of 14.5 percent. Almost three million shares traded in the first 40 minutes of the Nasdaq session -- double the average daily volume in the stock.
